name: Wave Echo Cave
description: Lost mine of the Phandelver's Pact, destroyed 500 years ago by orc invasion. Rich in silver, gold, platinum. Home to legendary Forge of Spells where magical items were enchanted.
atmosphere: Cold, damp, drafty. Rhythmic BOOMING echoes every 2 minutes from underground hot spring. Makes stone shiver underfoot. Ancient dwarven stonework, 30ft caverns with stalactites, natural passages.

general_features.doors: 6ft tall, 4ft wide, stone slabs, iron fittings (dwarf-sized)
general_features.wandering_monsters: Roll d20 if party lingers, 17-20 = encounter (d12: 1-3 stirges 2d4, 4-5 ghouls 1d4, 6 gricks 1d4, 7-8 bugbears 1d4, 9 skeletons 1d6, 10 zombies 1d6, 11-12 ochre jelly)

1_cave_entrance.name: Cave Entrance
1_cave_entrance.description: Large cavern with natural rock pillar, 3 stalagmites. Rockseeker camp with bedrolls and mining supplies. Tharden's corpse among supplies (dead 1 week, killed by Black Spider).
1_cave_entrance.climbing: DC 15 Athletics or use rope, fall 20ft = 2d6 damage
1_cave_entrance.treasure: Tharden wears boots of striding and springing (Nezznar overlooked them)
1_cave_entrance.notes: Nundro (youngest brother) is prisoner in area 20

2_mine_tunnels.name: Mine Tunnels
2_mine_tunnels.description: Maze of intersecting passages. 6ft ceilings. Dead-ends where miners gave up.
2_mine_tunnels.encounters: 1 ochre jelly stalks party patiently, waits for lone target
2_mine_tunnels.tactics: Jelly follows party through tunnels, attacks isolated character

3_old_entrance.name: Old Entrance
3_old_entrance.description: 30ft cavern. Ancient battle site - 2 dozen skeletons (dwarves, gnomes, orcs) litter floor. Walls carved with reliefs of miners working. 6 brass lanterns (unlit) in niches.
3_old_entrance.encounters: 10 stirges cling to ceiling like bats
3_old_entrance.surprise: Stirges attack if party looks down at skeletons. Passive Perception vs Stealth check to avoid surprise

4_old_guardroom.name: Old Guardroom
4_old_guardroom.description: Splintered stone benches, heaps of rubble from partial ceiling collapse. Ruined bunks, toppled weapon racks. Dwarf and orc bones.
4_old_guardroom.encounters: 9 skeletons animate 1 round after living creature enters
4_old_guardroom.tactics: Bones stir and knit together, fight until destroyed

5_assayers_office.name: Assayers' Office
5_assayers_office.description: Stone counter bisects room. 3 dusty iron balance scales. Cubbyholes with disintegrating paper scraps (Dwarvish weigh-in records). Corpses of gnomes and orcs on floor.
5_assayers_office.treasure: Locked strongbox behind counter (DC 20 Dexterity thieves' tools): 600 cp, 180 sp, 90 ep, 60 gp

6_south_barracks.name: South Barracks
6_south_barracks.description: Stone bunks in rows. Corroded brazier with old coals. Bones of dwarves and orcs in armor scraps.
6_south_barracks.encounters: 3 ghouls gnawing bones, eager for fresh meal
6_south_barracks.listen: DC 10 Perception hears crunching/splintering at door

7_ruined_storeroom.name: Ruined Storeroom
7_ruined_storeroom.description: Eastern wall collapsed to rubble. North door ajar to intact storeroom with cracked, empty kegs.
7_ruined_storeroom.notes: Secure resting place - monsters don't come here. Door can be barricaded from inside

8_fungi_cavern.name: Fungi Cavern
8_fungi_cavern.description: Dense carpets of weird fungi: 1ft puffballs, shelf fungus on stalagmites, 5ft tall stalks. Some puff balls glow eerie green (provides light without darkvision).
8_fungi_cavern.hazard: POISON GAS - crossing cavern releases gas. DC 11 Constitution save or 3d6 poison damage + poisoned 10 minutes. Gas disperses after 1 minute, but repeat save each turn in area.
8_fungi_cavern.blocks: Path to Forge of Spells - Nezznar reluctant to risk crossing
8_fungi_cavern.tactics: Sprint through quickly or wait for gas to disperse

9_great_cavern.name: Great Cavern
9_great_cavern.description: Banquet hall and mead hall for miners. Divided by 10ft escarpments with carved stairs. 2 large tables in middle, small table on east ledge. Braziers. Dozens of skeletal warriors (dwarves, gnomes, orcs, ogres).
9_great_cavern.encounters: 7 ghouls lurk on western ledge, attack on sight
9_great_cavern.escarpments: 10ft high, DC 12 Athletics to climb, fall = 1d6 + prone

10_dark_pool.name: Dark Pool
10_dark_pool.description: Still dark pool 20ft deep. Shore of broken pale mussel shells, fishy odor. Passage south, steps up east, stream flows northeast to area 18 (3ft deep, 2-3ft ceiling clearance).
10_dark_pool.treasure: Skeleton on pool bottom (10ft from shore, 10ft underwater): human wizard with orc arrows in ribs. Wears 2 platinum rings (75 gp each), clutches wand of magic missiles
10_dark_pool.notes: Wizard died defending mine 500 years ago

11_north_barracks.name: North Barracks
11_north_barracks.description: Stone bunks, glowing iron brazier for heat and light. Eastern door barricaded with table remains (DC 20 Strength to force).
11_north_barracks.encounters: 5 bugbears - Nezznar's loyal minions, prevent undead from reaching area 19
11_north_barracks.listen: DC 10 Perception hears gruff Goblin voices 'so hungry'
11_north_barracks.treasure: Largest bugbear: pouch with 15 cp, 13 ep, potion of vitality
11_north_barracks.notes: Removed corpses, built barricade, frontline defense

12_smelter_cavern.name: Smelter Cavern
12_smelter_cavern.description: Heart of mining operation. Blast furnace (cold/dark), mechanical waterwheel (dry), heaps of coal, carts of ore. 10ft channel (5ft below floor, exits north/east with 5ft ceiling). Dozen corpses in armor.
12_smelter_cavern.encounters: 1 flameskull (floating skull in green flames) + 8 zombies
12_smelter_cavern.flameskull: Ancient guardian, continues orders to block intruders. Intelligent undead.
12_smelter_cavern.zombies: Rise when living enters, pursue 1 round max outside area
12_smelter_cavern.channel: Former stream path from area 18, powered waterwheel for bellows
12_smelter_cavern.notes: Blocks path to Forge - Nezznar formulating plan to bypass

13_starry_cavern.name: Starry Cavern
13_starry_cavern.description: Glittering minerals in ceiling like starry night sky (pretty but not valuable). Dozens of crushed skeletons under debris. Divided by escarpment with stairs. 2 freestanding human-sized stone buildings (areas 14, 15) with blackened walls, scorched doors.
13_starry_cavern.magic_aura: DC Arcana proficiency or detect magic - subtle aura, stronger near north building (area 15 Forge)
13_starry_cavern.notes: Site of ancient spell battle, destructive magic damaged everything

14_wizards_quarters.name: Wizards' Quarters
14_wizards_quarters.description: Guesthouse for visiting human wizards. Fire-damaged: charred furniture (tables, chairs, bookshelves, beds), blackened walls, sagging ceiling. Scorched iron chest at bed foot. Doors cracked, hinges melted (DC 15 Strength to force).
14_wizards_quarters.encounters: Mormesk the wraith - restless spirit, rises from floor when entered
14_wizards_quarters.mormesk_personality: Grave whispers. 'Your presence offensive, life forfeit. MY treasures!' Irrevocably evil but listens if not attacked.
14_wizards_quarters.negotiation: Values magic items, scrolls, spellbooks, arcane knowledge. DC 10 Persuasion to convince gift acceptable. Will NOT give up wooden pipe. Gives coins/gems if party kills spectator (area 15). Allows browsing books for secret map.
14_wizards_quarters.treasure: Unlocked chest: 1,100 cp, 160 sp, 50 ep, 3 diamonds (100 gp each), platinum-filigree wooden pipe (150 gp). Bookshelves: secret map sewn in book cover (DC 12 Investigation) - leads to your next adventure
14_wizards_quarters.notes: Mormesk leads undead in Wave Echo Cave, can't touch treasure in death

15_forge_of_spells.name: Forge of Spells - THE HEART OF THE MINE
15_forge_of_spells.description: Legendary workshop where Phandelver's Pact enchanted magic items. Large damaged room: scorched worktables in corners, burned plaster off walls. CENTER: stone pedestal with brazier of EERIE GREEN FLAME (untouched by destruction).
15_forge_of_spells.encounters: 1 spectator (4ft sphere, 4 eyestalks, telepathic 'Hello') - deranged guardian
15_forge_of_spells.spectator_behavior: Summoned centuries ago, now insane. Believes mine still operational. Ignores undead 'workers'. ATTACKS if items removed. Disappears if blinded or 'fired' via DC 15 Deception (convince it's a wizard/owner terminating employment).
15_forge_of_spells.brazier_green_flame: DC 15 Arcana - source of cavern's fading magic. Can no longer PERMANENTLY enchant. Bathing weapon/armor 1 minute = +1 for 1d12 hours. CANNOT be removed.
15_forge_of_spells.north_room: Finishing workshop for items pre-enchantment. Almost destroyed.
15_forge_of_spells.treasure: Worktable SE corner: LIGHTBRINGER (+1 mace, brass sunburst head, glows on command, +1d6 radiant vs undead for Lathander clerics) + DRAGONGUARD (+1 breastplate, gold dragon motif, advantage on dragon breath saves, made for Tergon of Neverwinter)
15_forge_of_spells.tactics: Mormesk wants spectator dead. Spectator has defeated Mormesk's undead easily. Can negotiate or fight.
15_forge_of_spells.notes: MOST IMPORTANT LOCATION - reason Nezznar came here

16_booming_cavern.name: Booming Cavern - Source of Wave Echo
16_booming_cavern.description: Water-filled cavern. Narrow ledge 15ft above water on south wall. Rhythmic BOOMING loudest here. Every 2 minutes surge slams against wall, raising water +10ft for 1 minute (then drops to normal 20ft depth).
16_booming_cavern.hazard: Underground hot spring boils over → surge through narrow funnel → sound like breaking surf
16_booming_cavern.notes: This is what gives Wave Echo Cave its name. One arm of larger cavern to northeast.

17_old_streambed.name: Old Streambed
17_old_streambed.description: Barely 4ft high passage obstructed by rounded boulders/pebbles. No water flows now.
17_old_streambed.history: Originally stream from area 10 → area 16. Dwarves diverted to area 12 channel for waterwheel. Earthquake from spell battle collapsed area 18 floor, rerouted stream again.
17_old_streambed.secret_path: Circumvents undead in area 12 - Nezznar hasn't discovered
17_old_streambed.tactical: Low crawl, difficult terrain, but avoids flameskull fight

18_collapsed_cavern.name: Collapsed Cavern
18_collapsed_cavern.description: Wide rift fills east half. Stream pours from west wall, tumbles into rift, flows out north. Ropes on iron stakes lead down rift.
18_collapsed_cavern.encounters: 3 bugbears (2 clearing rubble in rift, 1 guard) + 1 doppelganger (Vhalak, disguised as male drow, supervises)
18_collapsed_cavern.rift: 20ft deep, DC 10 Athletics to climb without rope, fall = 1d6/10ft + prone
18_collapsed_cavern.doppelganger_tactics: If 2+ bugbears killed, retreats to area 19 to warn Nezznar
18_collapsed_cavern.treasure: Rift bottom buried in rubble: crushed dwarf skeleton wearing gauntlets of ogre power (DC 20 Perception, 1 check/hour searching)
18_collapsed_cavern.notes: Nezznar's divinations led him here - treasure confirmed accurate

19_temple_of_dumathoin.name: Temple of Dumathoin - NEZZNAR'S HQ
19_temple_of_dumathoin.description: 6 cracked marble pillars. North end: 9ft statue of dwarf on throne with stone warhammer, LARGE EMERALDS in eyes (FAKE - worthless glass, DC 15 Investigation). Campsite: bedrolls, packs, fire pit, wooden table with Nezznar's notes.
19_temple_of_dumathoin.boss_fight: NEZZNAR THE BLACK SPIDER (drow evil mage with spider staff) + 4 giant spiders
19_temple_of_dumathoin.nezznar_tactics: If warned: spiders hide behind pillars (Stealth check), Nezznar casts invisibility, stands by table. Spiders web first, then melee. Nezznar joins round 2.
19_temple_of_dumathoin.nezznar_personality: Curious, quizzes party about identities/goals. Admits being Black Spider. Promises cooperation but betrays instantly. Uses Cragmaws/Redbrands as pawns.
19_temple_of_dumathoin.doppelganger_trick: If area 18 doppelganger fled here, disguises as Nundro for leverage (won't actually harm it)
19_temple_of_dumathoin.statue_trap: Removing either emerald eye (DC 10 Strength) → pillars crack → ceiling collapse. DC 15 Dexterity save or 4d10 bludgeoning + prone (half on save)
19_temple_of_dumathoin.treasure: Nezznar: potion of healing, spider staff, iron key (area 20). Table sack: 190 ep, 130 gp, 15 pp, 9 gems (10 gp each), dwarven electrum ale mug (100 gp)
19_temple_of_dumathoin.xp_bonus: DOUBLE XP if Nezznar captured alive and delivered to Sildar/Harbin
19_temple_of_dumathoin.betrayal: If captured without guards, Halia Thornton breaks him out, gives to Zhentarim
19_temple_of_dumathoin.reinforcements: Area 18 creatures hear combat, arrive round 4 if still alive

20_priests_quarters.name: Priests' Quarters - Nundro's Prison
20_priests_quarters.description: Dusty draperies, bed, brazier. NUNDRO ROCKSEEKER bound unconscious on floor - badly beaten, disheveled.
20_priests_quarters.door: Locked (DC 15 Dexterity thieves' tools or Nezznar's key from area 19)
20_priests_quarters.nundro: Youngest brother, interrogated harshly 1-2x daily by Nezznar. Grateful if rescued, offers to join party but knows no more than them about layout.
20_priests_quarters.development: Safe resting spot after Nezznar defeated
20_priests_quarters.xp: 200 XP if Nundro rescued and survives
20_priests_quarters.notes: Former priest's quarters for temple (area 19), repurposed as cell

conclusion.victory: Black Spider defeated, Redbrands eliminated, mine reclaimed. Deeds remembered in Sword Coast. Mine brought back into production.
conclusion.rewards: Gundren + Nundro give party 10% mine profits
conclusion.options: Stay in Phandalin (restore Tresendar Manor, establish homes) or move on to next adventure
conclusion.next_adventure: Secret map from area 14 leads to new dungeon

boss: Nezznar the Black Spider (area 19) + 4 giant spiders + bugbears

key_treasure.forge_15: Lightbringer +1 mace, Dragonguard +1 breastplate, green flame brazier (temp +1 enchanting)
key_treasure.mormesk_14: 3 diamonds (100 gp each), platinum pipe (150 gp), secret adventure map
key_treasure.pool_10: Wand of magic missiles, 2 platinum rings (75 gp each)

critical_encounters: Area 8: Fungi poison gas (blocks Forge path)
